loops.name: Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update
loops.label: Loop through Resources and send update

textTemplates.name: SupervisorTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update.ServiceResource.Supervisor__r.LastName},

Details of {!Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update.ServiceAppointment.AppointmentNumber}/ {!Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update.ServiceAppointment.Case__r.CaseNumber} have changed. Check the details on portal.

Case Status: {!Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update.ServiceAppointment.Status}

Appointment Status: {!Loop_through_Resources_and_send_update.ServiceAppointment.Case__r.Status}
